graphics

Class Designer

  • java.lang.Object
    • graphics.Designer

  • public class Designer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class access and initializes openGL library to creates the Display screen of size noRows*noColumns*32(pixels).

      • beginSession

        public static void beginSession(int numRows,
                                int numCols)
        This method sets openGL Parameters for the Display screen and printing the text

      • drawQuadTex

        public static void drawQuadTex(Texture tex,
                               float x,
                               float y,
                               float width,
                               float height)
        This method draws quad for a specific texture. The texture refers to a tile
        Parameters:
        tex - TYexture of the tile
        x - X Coordinate of the tile (quad)
        y - Y Coordinate of the tile (quad)
        width - location of the tile in the map along x axis
        height - location of the tile in the map along y axis

      • loadTexture

        public static Texture loadTexture(java.lang.String path,
                                  java.lang.String fileType)
        This method loads the texture of tile
        Parameters:
        path - directory path of png file of the tile
        fileType - format of the tile
        Returns:

      • quickTexture

        public static Texture quickTexture(java.lang.String name)
        This method is a helper. This method adds the package and the type of the file
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the tile
        Returns:
        texture of the tile
